divs: Sighting DetailsWe were watching fireworks in the sky then notice an bright orange light moving fast toward us then stopped n the sky we starred at it ti see if it was a Plane or Jet then we said planes or jets dont stop then we thought it might be the helicopter then said that is way to high to be a helicopter so we stared at it for a few minutes then watch it move around that same area then flash of and on then it went from left to right up and down then disapear out of the sky. This was strange then a few minutes later it re-appeared on the left side of the moon and did the same exact thing as before. so we recorded it sorry not a good video.
